hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.11) Gecko/2009051909 Firefox/3.0.11
hopobject.body:
BeagleBoard Sponsored Projects Program

You can now register your project now at the contest homepage on eLinux.org for an opportunity to get a free board for your project development. Two (2) boards are being given away every week to those with the best project ideas as chosen by a team of community members. Those who execute well on their registered projects also have the opportunity to get an Always Innovating Touch Book or a Gumstix Palo43 system given away once a month.

Software Design Contest #2
Contest is now completed and you can read about the winners on the contest homepage on eLinux.org.

Software Design Contest #1
Read about the winner of the first contest on robots.net and Linux Devices. You can learn about the other entries on the contest homepage on eLinux.org. You can also register your entry for a chance to win next month's contest.
